channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Media's MAGA makeover
item.description: Trump-friendly billionaires are consolidating control over American media, steering legacy brands and social platforms in a new conservative direction...

item.title: Photos: Scenes from Trump's U.K. visit, from pageantry to protests
item.description: President Trump was hosted by King Charles III in southeast England during the first full day of his second U.K. state visit on Wednesday. The big pic...

item.title: House Democrats fume about vote to honor Charlie Kirk: "We're being totally set up"
item.description: A resolution to honor conservative activist Charlie Kirk and condemn his assassination has been the subject of frenzied talk among House Democrats thi...

item.title: Crunch time arrives for RFK Jr.'s vaccine advisers
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s push to reshape vaccine policy will hit a crescendo on Thursday, when his handpicked advisory panel is expect...

item.title: Washington's next big debate: what to do about jobs AI eliminates
item.description: Axios' 2025 AI+ Summit mapped a stark divide in approaches to handling a predicted tidal wave of jobs disrupted or eliminated by AI. Why it matters : ...

item.title: For the first time, Bernie Sanders calls Israel’s war in Gaza a genocide
item.description: His move comes a day after a U.N. panel said Israel was committing genocide in Gaza. Israel rejected the findings, which echo those of a growing numbe...

item.title: Effort to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar over Charlie Kirk comments fails
item.description: The effort was part of a GOP campaign to punish individuals Republicans accuse of posthumously smearing Kirk.

item.title: Trump, allies seek to punish speech they dislike following Kirk killing
item.description: The White House-directed campaign, which is likely to face legal challenges, defies past GOP rhetoric condemning the label “hate speech” as a pretext ...

item.title: U.S. wins release of Wells Fargo banker placed under exit ban in China
item.description: Beijing has allowed Mao Chenyue, a bank managing director in Atlanta, to return to the United States, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Trump meets with royal family in pomp-filled state visit to Britain
item.description: The U.S. president was largely insulated from protesters in a country where he remains unpopular. He plans to meet with Prime Minister Keir Starmer on...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
